thread.title: Great hotel, location and staff
thread.title_full: Great hotel, location and staff - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: richard b
title: Great hotel, location and staff
text: I spent 2 nights at the Viceroy. The check-in was fast and easy and the staff informative and warm. I had a Jr Suite and the attention to detail was high. Comfy bed. The room had a modern heating and cooling system so it was loud like some hotels in NYC. The gym while on the smaller side had fully functioning equipment. I ate breakfast at the restaurant. Good food but a little pricey for breakfast. All this and what a great location right by Carnegie Hall. I'd stay there again.
